description:
A dead simple Wii backup manager.


What's Changed
- ðŸ‘· Standalone and Portable are now the same binary, portable mode is turned on when the exe name contains "portable" by @mq1 in #321

- â™»ï¸ Refactoring and very minor optimization by @mq1 in #323
- ðŸš¸ Better split file reading implementation by @mq1 in #324
- ðŸš¸ More precise split file writing by @mq1 in #325
